mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) CON FROM DDJ02_DDJ01
SELECT COUNT(*) CON FROM DDJ02_DDJ01 D1,DDJ02 D2 WHERE D1.DDJ02_JFID=D2.JFID AND D2.MC LIKE '%'||#{0}||'%'
SELECT D2.YHM,D2.MC,D2.XZQH,D2.DZ,D2.YDDH,D2.XB,D2.SR,D2.XL,D2.JTRK,D2.RJSR,D2.SCMJ,D1.FWNR,D2.BZ FROM DDJ02 D2,DDJ02_DDJ01 D1 WHERE D2.JFID=D1.DDJ02_JFID AND D1.DDJ01_JFID=#{0} AND D2.YHM=#{1}
SELECT JFID,YHM,MC,XZQH,XZQH XZQHMC,DZ,YDDH,YHLB,XB,SR,XL,JTRK,RJSR,SCMJ,BZ,YX FROM DDJ02 WHERE YHM=#{0}

SELECT D2.JFID,D2.YHM,D2.MC,D2.XZQH,D2.XZQH XZQHMC,D2.DZ,D2.YDDH,D2.YHLB,D2.XB,D2.SR,D2.XL,D2.JTRK,D2.RJSR,D2.SCMJ,D1.FWNR,D2.BZ,D2.YX FROM DDJ02 D2,DDJ02_DDJ01 D1 WHERE D2.JFID=D1.DDJ02_JFID AND D1.DDJ01_JFID!=#{0} AND D2.YHM=#{1}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO DDJ02
JFID, YHM, JFPASSWORD, MC, XZQH, DZ, YDDH, XB, SR, XL, JTRK, RJSR, YX, BZ, LRRY, LRRY_MC, LRRQ, YHLB, SCMJ,
#{JFID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{YHM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{JFPASSWORD,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{XZQH,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DZ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{YDDH,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{XB,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{SR,jdbcType=DATE}, #{XL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{JTRK,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{RJSR,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{YX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BZ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LRRY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LRRY_MC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{YHLB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SCMJ,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.select: SELECT S_DDJ02.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
SELECT QC2 FROM DSYS81 WHERE BM=#{0}
SELECT JFID,YHM,JFPASSWORD,MC FROM DDJ02 WHERE YHM=#{0}

SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(DISTINCT D2.JFID) FROM DDJ02 D2,DDJ02_DDJ01 D2_D1 WHERE D2_D1.DDJ02_JFID=D2.JFID
AND D2.MC LIKE '%'||#{MC}||'%'
AND D2.XZQH LIKE '%'||#{XZQH}||'%'
AND D2_D1.DDJ01_JFID=#{DDJ01_JFID}

SELECT SUBSTR(A.XZQH,1,5) XZQH,F_GET_MC('FBDQ',SUBSTR(A.XZQH,1,5)) XZQHMC,COUNT(A.JFID) JTRK,NVL(SUM(A.SCMJ),0) SCMJ FROM DDJ02 A
,DDJ02_DDJ01 B
WHERE 1=1
AND A.JFID=B.DDJ02_JFID AND B.DDJ01_JFID=${DDJ01_JFID}
AND A.LRRQ >= to_date(${StarTime},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND A.LRRQ < to_date(${EndTime},'yyyy-mm-dd')+1
AND A.XZQH LIKE '%'||${XZQH}||'%'
AND SUBSTR(A.XZQH,1,5) IN ('15611','15612','15613') GROUP BY SUBSTR(A.XZQH,1,5),F_GET_MC('FBDQ',SUBSTR(A.XZQH,1,5)) ORDER BY SUBSTR(A.XZQH,1,5)

SELECT SUBSTR(A.XZQH,1,7) XZQH,F_GET_MC('FBDQ',SUBSTR(A.XZQH,1,7)) XZQHMC,COUNT(A.JFID) JTRK,NVL(SUM(A.SCMJ),0) SCMJ FROM DDJ02 A
,DDJ02_DDJ01 B
WHERE 1=1
AND A.JFID=B.DDJ02_JFID AND B.DDJ01_JFID=${DDJ01_JFID}
AND A.LRRQ >= to_date(${StarTime},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND A.LRRQ < to_date(${EndTime},'yyyy-mm-dd')+1
AND A.XZQH LIKE '%'||${XZQH}||'%'
AND SUBSTR(A.XZQH,1,5) IN ('15611','15612','15613') GROUP BY SUBSTR(A.XZQH,1,7),F_GET_MC('FBDQ',SUBSTR(A.XZQH,1,7)) ORDER BY SUBSTR(A.XZQH,1,7)

SELECT SUBSTR(A.XZQH,1,9) XZQH,F_GET_MC('FBDQ',SUBSTR(A.XZQH,1,9)) XZQHMC,COUNT(A.JFID) JTRK,NVL(SUM(A.SCMJ),0) SCMJ FROM DDJ02 A
,DDJ02_DDJ01 B
WHERE 1=1
AND A.JFID=B.DDJ02_JFID AND B.DDJ01_JFID=${DDJ01_JFID}
AND A.LRRQ >= to_date(${StarTime},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND A.LRRQ < to_date(${EndTime},'yyyy-mm-dd')+1
AND A.XZQH LIKE '%'||${XZQH}||'%'
AND SUBSTR(A.XZQH,1,5) IN ('15611','15612','15613') GROUP BY SUBSTR(A.XZQH,1,9),F_GET_MC('FBDQ',SUBSTR(A.XZQH,1,9)) ORDER BY SUBSTR(A.XZQH,1,9)

SELECT B.DDJ01_JFID XZQH,F_GET_MC('ZFZZ',B.DDJ01_JFID) XZQHMC,COUNT(A.JFID) JTRK,NVL(SUM(A.SCMJ),0) SCMJ FROM DDJ02 A
,DDJ02_DDJ01 B
,DDJ02_DDJ01 B
WHERE 1=1
AND A.JFID=B.DDJ02_JFID
AND A.JFID=B.DDJ02_JFID AND B.DDJ01_JFID=${DDJ01_JFID}
AND A.LRRQ >= to_date(${StarTime},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND A.LRRQ < to_date(${EndTime},'yyyy-mm-dd')+1
AND A.XZQH LIKE '%'||${XZQH}||'%'
AND SUBSTR(A.XZQH,1,5) IN ('15611','15612','15613') GROUP BY B.DDJ01_JFID,F_GET_MC('ZFZZ',B.DDJ01_JFID) ORDER BY F_GET_MC('ZFZZ',B.DDJ01_JFID)

SELECT COUNT(A.JFID) JTRK,NVL(SUM(A.SCMJ),0) SCMJ FROM DDJ02 A
,DDJ02_DDJ01 B
,DDJ02_DDJ01 B
WHERE 1=1
AND A.JFID=B.DDJ02_JFID
AND A.JFID=B.DDJ02_JFID AND B.DDJ01_JFID=${DDJ01_JFID}
AND A.LRRQ >= to_date(${StarTime},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND A.LRRQ < to_date(${EndTime},'yyyy-mm-dd')+1
AND A.XZQH LIKE '%'||${XZQH}||'%'
AND SUBSTR(A.XZQH,1,5) IN ('15611','15612','15613')
SELECT * FROM (SELECT A1.*,ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT JFID,MC FROM DDJ02 ) A1 WHERE ROWNUM <=#{MAX}) WHERE RN>=#{MIN}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DDJ02

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT D2.JFID) FROM DDJ02 D2,DDJ02_DDJ01 D2_D1 WHERE D2.JFID=D2_D1.DDJ02_JFID
AND D2.MC LIKE '%'||#{MC}||'%'
AND D2.XZQH LIKE '%'||#{XZQH}||'%'
AND D2_D1.DDJ01_JFID=#{DDJ01_JFID}
